8. Help Page:
* A set of frequently asked questions (FAQs)
* A contact form that allows users to submit support requests
* A phone number and email address for contacting support
* A link to online documentation or user manual
* A link to a forum or community where users can ask and answer questions.
9. Tiered Pricing Page:
* A list view of different customer groups and their associated prices
* A "Add Group" button that allows users to create new pricing groups
* A "Edit Group" button that allows users to edit existing pricing groups
* A "Delete Group" button that allows users to remove pricing groups
10. Pricing History Page:
* A list view of past pricing changes, including the date, product, and new price
* A "Download History" button that allows users to export the pricing history in a spreadsheet format
* A chart or graph to visually display pricing trends over time
* A "Filter by Product" option to view pricing history for a specific product
* A "Filter by Date Range" option to view pricing history for a specific time period
11. Purchase Order/List Page:
* A list view of purchase orders and lists, including the customer, products, quantities, and
